articles.title: 'Messi mania' in China as fans clamor for a glimpse of Argentina star
articles.description: Beijing police have urged fans of Lionel Messi not to be cheated by expensive scams after the soccer superstar landed in China last weekend.
articles.content:

articles.title: James Cameron feels he 'walked into an ambush' in Argentine lithium dispute
articles.description: Movie director James Cameron says he feels he “walked into an ambush” this week during a visit to Argentina in which he believes there was an attempt to use his image as an environmentalist to give a positive spin to lithium mining operations despite Indigenous opposition.
articles.content:
Daniel Politi , The Associated Press

articles.description: The ECHO's Keifer MacDonald speaks to leading figures in Argentina about Alexis Mac Allister's journey from Buenos Aires to Anfield

articles.title: India end FIH Pro League campaign with 2-1 win over Argentina
articles.description: A day after suffering a 2-3 defeat to hosts Netherlands, the Indian team made a comeback and emerged victorious through goals from Akashdeep Singh (1st minute) and Sukhjeet Singh (13th).
articles.content:
Eindhoven: India returned to winning ways with a 2-1 victory over Argentina in the FIH Pro League hockey tournament in Eindhoven on Sunday, ending the 2022-23 season on a positive note.

articles.title: Uruguay beats Italy 1-0 to win maiden Under-20 World Cup title
articles.description: LA PLATA, Argentina (AP) — Uruguay beat Italy 1-0 on Sunday to win its first Under-20 World Cup title. The Celeste’s victory ends a streak of four con...
articles.content:
LA PLATA, Argentina (AP) — Uruguay beat Italy 1-0 on Sunday to win its first Under-20 World Cup title. The Celeste’s victory ends a streak of four consecutive wins of European teams in the tournament.

articles.title: Argentina inflation seen hitting 149% this year, up from previous poll
articles.description: Analysts polled by Argentina's central bank forecast annual inflation this year at 149%, above the 126% expected in the previous poll, according to the monthly survey released on Friday. For May, the analysts polled expect prices to have risen 9% in the month.
articles.content:

articles.title: Liverpool: £35m star will 'walk straight into the team' at Anfield
articles.description: The Argentina midfielder will be in Jurgen Klopp's starting XI come the first game of the season, Ste Hoare of The Redmen TV has told GIVEMESPORT.
articles.content:
Liverpool signing Alexis Mac Allister "walks straight into" the side and will start the first game of the season, Ste Hoare of The Redmen TV has told GIVEMESPORT.
Mac Allister has reportedly agreed to join Liverpool from Brighton & Hove Albion.
